reviews.review_msg: Worst lecturer I have ever had - reads off a paper. knows the subject well, but doesn't make it interesting. rude and disinterested in teaching at all, it seems.  the tutorials were a bit better, she chose interesting readings, but it was a waste of time being in her class. i could have just read the book and taken more away...

The only good thing about her teaching is that she seems to know a great deal about her subject. Other than that, she is monotonous and is never prepared. Make sure you know the geography of your region first because she doesn't provide maps!
